instructions: Enter a search term, phrase, or URL in the search field at the top of the page. Tap a search suggestion, or tap Go on the keyboard to search for exactly what you typed.
Tap the Share button , then tap Find on Page. Enter the word or phrase in the search field. Tap the Search Down button to find other instances.
On your Android phone or tablet, open the Messages app . Tap More and then Settings and then Help improve Messages . Turn off Improve Messages .
